title: This compact Baseus 45W travel adapter just hit its first-ever price drop
summary: Save 33% and have one less thing to think about when planning your next trip.
body: Credit: Amazon January can feel like a bit of a slog. The festive season is largely behind us, the weather isnâ€™t exactly inspiring, and summer feels a long way off. One of the easiest ways to get past that funk is to start planning your next exciting adventure, and that includes picking up a few travel essentials early. A good example is the new Baseus PicoGo AG11 45W travel adapter, which just caught its first-ever price drop. Baseus PicoGo AG11 45W travel adapter for $26.99 ($13 off)
